articles.description: England and Sweden played each other in the final of the first Women’s European Championship in 1984 on a quagmire of a pitch. The contrast with 2022’s semi-final could hardly be greater

articles.title: Gazprom to cut gas supply to Europe by 80pc - The Telegraph
